attributes.title: HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: This app has scarred me for life. When I opened it all I saw were weird Cheeto men and signs saying Trump 2020; Now I can proudly say that I have found a cult app. I do not recommend this app it is trying to brainwash people. I had nightmares for weeks about the Cheeto man chasing me and yelling trump 2020 and ending fake news.

attributes.title: Damaged my device
attributes.review: I have reinstalled this app twice now but every time I open it I either am shown the image of a single flamin hot Cheeto or a terminal window. My phone keeps crashing after I spend more than 5 seconds on the app. Huge disappointment!!!

attributes.title: horrible :(
attributes.review: this app has to be one of the worst apps I’ve ever downloaded in my entire life, it made my device so insanely slow and kept kicking me out of the app every time I would try to go into it, I just wanted to see so called “exclusive content” 😔🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: Not a great app
attributes.review: It’s just not a good app. Requires you to sign up for an account before providing any sort of information. Not very open to people who may not be ready to sign up for having info sent to them but want information.

attributes.title: ✨horrible✨
attributes.review: This app is so bad!😽Like I can’t stand it!😻Everything about the app is ugly and horrible and I don’t understand the use of it💖 ppl who use the app are brats😼 DONT DOWNLOAD ITS A BAD IDEA🙀

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP😡😡🤢🤮🤮
attributes.review:
it took a week and a half to download and it’s EXTREMELY cluttered. also i was looking to see pictures and good info about the cheeto puff but all i found was racism and homophobia!! absolutely disgusting. the orange cheeto puff has to go- sincerely,
                            gen z✨😌😹 

Overall rating= absolutely horrible. vote trump out 2020, and AOC 2024🤩😌✨

attributes.title: very disappointed
attributes.review: They force you to get your phone signed up to their updates. I thought that was what the app was for?? Bad design, low functionality, pretty much pointless. I thought MY president could do better. Very disappointed.

attributes.title: Spam and too many lies
attributes.review: I’m pretty sure the app should be banned for collecting too much personal information - Plus the graphics and user interface design deserves zero stars.      The app also appears to be for white supremacists and fascists...  not sure how it ever got approved.

attributes.title: Keeps crashing and small font
attributes.review: This app is pretty bad. It keeps crashing all the time. I’m trying to use it on my iPad because I can’t see my phone even with my reading glasses. It needs to be more user friendly for us older Trump supporters

attributes.title: Very glitchy
attributes.review: The whole app is very glitchy and doesn't work well at all. After about a week it started to shut off my whole phone when I tried to turn it on. Absolutely ridiculous
